meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6053.

td.p: Ellen Kimmel, a school nurse from Nanuet, New York
Raghuveer Mukkamalla, an IT analyst from Herndon, Virginia
Marissa Goldsmith, a web developer from Springfield, Virginia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $44,100)

tr.td: JOHANNES BRAHMS
A DAY AT THE HORSE RACES
U.S. FLAG ETIQUETTE
NOT SO FAMOUS LAST WORDS
DO TRY THIS AT HOME
"BABY" TALK

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Raghuveer: What is the violin?)

the piano

MarissaRaghuveer
')

"You have no right to expect me to send you back to Kansas" appears in a 1900 novel & in an epigraph to this 1995 novel
